name: data_dir
description: Path to where octofin can store permanent data

name: jellyfin_server_url
description: URL of the jellyfin server as seen by octofin.

name: jellyfin_api_key
description: External applications are required to have an API key in order to communicate with the server. You can generate a key by going into admin dashboard > API Keys

name: use_cache
description: Allows the use of storing cache files for downloading and quick retrieval.

name: yt_cookies_path
description: Path to the cookies generated by yt-dlp.

name: po_token
description: Your GVS PO Token as obtained from the official Youtube Music client. It is generally not needed unless you want to download premium sound quality and own a premium subscription.

name: yt_music_download_dir
description: Path for where the downloaded music files would go. Normally the path to your music library would come here.

name: song_storage_pattern
description: Pattern for how octofin will store your downloaded music files.

name: cover_art_size
description: Resolution of the cover size you want to download. Maximum size supported is 1400
